title: Cheese Wedge

nouns: A solid food prepared from the pressed curd of milk
A dairy product made from curdled or cultured milk.
A curdled or cultured milk product.
Generic term for a diverse group of milk-based food products
Cheese is a food derived from milk that is produced in a wide range of flavors, textures, and forms by coagulation of the milk protein casein.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: A wedge of yellow-orange cheese with holes, like a Swiss, but used for the food in general. May be used for various cheese-related slang expressions (e.g., “cheesy,” “say cheese,” “big cheese”).
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the cheese wedge emoji presents a delectable slice of Swiss cheese with distinct, inviting holes. Its surface boasts Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading, making the yellow cheese appear rich and slightly translucent under realistic lighting. The soft, rounded edges contribute to its friendly and approachable appearance, often used to signify food, snacking, or a delicious treat in digital conversations.
